content: Hi. I'm trying to add a number of missing cases to std::io::ErrorKind, in https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/79965. It's not a compiler thing but maybe there is a Windows IO API expert here who can review the Windows side of my MR? The top commit of that branch has all the meat. Thanks for your attention.
@Arlie Davis This might be of interest to you
Thanks, I'll take a look at this today.
